issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
nodeadmin-unpack-instances is failing when attempting to unpack ebs instances.  I tested this in a standard VPC and netapp cloud.  Output below:
{code}

comments.body:
[~ccassler] got the info by digging around.

fix coming through

I believe this is because the local ip is coming back as the loopback, fix below now gets correct ip.


/usr/libexec/eucalyptus/nodeadmin-manage-volume-connections ConnectVolumes -s 10.111.5.126:8773 -i i-ecfacf27
searching for '/instance/volumes/volume' in '(null)/instance.xml'
ERROR from XML2/XSLT {I/O warning : failed to load external entity "(null)/instance.xml"}
failed to parse XML in '(null)/instance.xml'
Found local iqn=iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:3440e6e52572 and local ip=127.0.0.1
[root@e-11 ~]# ./nodeadmin-manage-volume-connections ConnectVolumes -s 10.111.5.126:8773 -i i-ecfacf27
searching for '/instance/volumes/volume' in '(null)/instance.xml'
ERROR from XML2/XSLT {I/O warning : failed to load external entity "(null)/instance.xml"}
failed to parse XML in '(null)/instance.xml'
Searching for IP by hostname e-11.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
Found local iqn=iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:3440e6e52572 and local ip=10.111.1.126
The correct ip address will now be detected from the local node controller.

[~jbreiding]: This is fixed.  I discovered that the keys were invalid on the NCs when trying to unpack instances.  Once I ran clusteradmin-copy-keys on the SC, instances were unpacked properly.
{code}
[root@e-11 ~]# rpm -qi eucalyptus
Name        : eucalyptus
Version     : 4.3.0
Release     : 0.25026.354.20160712git783d0ca.el7
Architecture: x86_64
Install Date: Wed 13 Jul 2016 02:36:14 PM PDT
Group       : Applications/System
Size        : 268093
License     : GPLv3
Signature   : (none)
Source RPM  : eucalyptus-4.3.0-0.25026.354.20160712git783d0ca.el7.src.rpm
Build Date  : Tue 12 Jul 2016 02:59:28 PM PDT
Build Host  : euca-10-111-54-156
{code}

[~jbreiding]: I reverted this issue to QA because I ran into this again.  The upgrade process I took here was, I upgraded the NCs first and ran nodeadmin-unpack-instance while the other systems were running 4.3 on Centos6u7.  The unpack was successful so I upgraded the rest of the hosts to Centos7.  After I restored the database and finished the upgrade, I received the errors as described in the bug.
{code}
2016-07-14 02:24:19  INFO | using file //var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/node-cert.pem
2016-07-14 02:24:19  INFO | using file //var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/node-pk.pem
2016-07-14 02:24:19  INFO | using file //var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/cloud-cert.pem
2016-07-14 02:24:19 ERROR | operation on 10.111.5.126 could not be invoked (check SC host, port, and credentials)
2016-07-14 02:24:19 ERROR | Failed to get connection information for volume vol-7d428245 from storage controller at: http://10.111.5.126:8773/services/Storage
Error connecting ebs volume vol-7d428245
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/sbin/nodeadmin-unpack-instance", line 306, in <module>
    sys.exit(main(args, log_level))
  File "/usr/sbin/nodeadmin-unpack-instance", line 296, in main
    instance_tuple[1], args.packed_file, args.sc_host_port)
  File "/usr/sbin/nodeadmin-unpack-instance", line 246, in unpack_instance
    _connect_volumes(instance_name, sc_host_port)
  File "/usr/sbin/nodeadmin-unpack-instance", line 213, in _connect_volumes
    rc = check_call(scclient_cmd)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 542, in check_call
    raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd)
subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['/usr/libexec/eucalyptus/nodeadmin-manage-volume-connections', 'ConnectVolumes', '-s', '10.111.5.126:8773', '-i', u'i-62cbca7e']' returned non-zero exit status 1
{code}

Verified.  I haven't run into this issue on latest build.
{code}
Name        : eucalyptus-nc
Version     : 4.3.0
Release     : 0.25045.376.20160722git3c3c4d7.el7
Architecture: x86_64
Install Date: Tue 26 Jul 2016 12:21:35 PM PDT
{code}
